#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

#define mod 1000000007

long long pr(long long a, long long b)
{
    if (b == 0)
        return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	else if(b==2)
		return (a*a)%mod;
	else if (b%2==0)
	{
		long long f = pr(a,b/2);
		return (f*f)%mod;
	}
	else
	{
		long long f = pr(a,(b-1)/2);
		return (a*((f*f)%mod))%mod;
	}
}

int main()
{
	long long t, l, length, i, j, s, p, diff, x, c, y, tmp;
	string st;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
    {
		cin>>l>>st;
		length = st.size();
		int z[length];
	    for(j=0;j<length;j++)
	    {
	    	z[j] = (int)(st[j]-'a'+1);
		}
	    p = 1;
	    s = 0;
    	for(i=0;i<min(length,l);i++)
        {
        	c = p;
			p = (p*z[i])%mod;
        	s = (s+p)%mod;
        }
        p = (p-1+mod)%mod;
        //cout << s << endl;
        diff = l-length;
        if(diff>=0)
        {
            s = s-1;
            if (s < 0)
                s += mod;
            tmp = (p * 26)%mod;
            tmp = (tmp * (pr(26, diff)-1+mod))%mod;
            tmp = (tmp * pr(25, mod-2))%mod;
            s = (s + tmp)%mod;
		   	/*x = (c*(st[length-1]-'a'))%mod;
    		y = ((pr(26,diff)-1)*x)%mod;
    		s = (s+(((26*y)%mod)*pr(25,1000000005)))%mod;*/
    	}
	    cout<<s<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
